passives.name: Deadly Duelist
passives.description: When dual wielding or using a Light Blade, increases your haste by 20%.

passives.name: Lethal Toxins
passives.description: Increases the effectiveness of skills' slow by 33% of the base amount.

passives.name: Shadow Proficiency
passives.description: Your critical strikes have a 25% chance to generate 20 Aether. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.

passives.name: Killer Instinct
passives.description: Deals 10% more damage to targets under 50% health.

passives.name: Trickster
passives.description: Every hit you land on the target, will steal Movement Speed from it by 1% for 3.5 seconds. Double the amount for melee. Up to 10 stacks. Dealing damage to a different target will remove trickster effects from the previous target. This effect can occur every 0.5 seconds.

passives.name: Cheap Shot
passives.description: Whenever you deal damage, there is a 10% chance to increase your current Critical Strike Chance by 10% for 6 seconds.

ravencards.name: saltdusk cutthroat
ravencards.description: Death Blossoms (Spell) critical chance is 36.0% higher than your natural critical chance.

ravencards.name: widow queen
ravencards.description: Death Blossom (Spell) reduces the (Defense Power) of its target hit by 7.5% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Illusive
spells.description: Dodges all incoming basic attacks and non-area ability damage for 2 seconds, but your (Weapon Power) and (Spell Power) will be reduced by 30% for the duration of Illusive. Increases duration by 0.8 second per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: pirate swashbuckler
ravencards.description: You have a 30.0% chance to dodge any type of damage whenever Illusive (Spell) is active.

ravencards.name: chainwraith creep
ravencards.description: Cleanses 3 movement impairing types, such as slow, stuns and snares when using Illusive (Spell). Increases the cooldown of Illusive (Spell) by 55.0 seconds.

spells.name: Shadowstrike
spells.description: Stabs the target, dealing 50.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage, applying a Bleed that deals 15.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage every second for 4 seconds. Increases damage and bleeding damage by 20% per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: hobgoblin
ravencards.description: Shadowstrike (Spell) no longer causes the target to bleed, however Aether bonus damage is increased by 150.0%.

ravencards.name: skeleton haunt
ravencards.description: If your target is affected by a (Weapon Defense) debuff, Shadowstrike (Spell) deals additional 120.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage}.

spells.name: Venomous Weapons
spells.description: For the next 15 seconds, basic attacks and whenever you cast a skill and deal damage, reduce target's (Defense Power) by 1% for 8 seconds, up to 10 stacks.

ravencards.name: toadstool warrior
ravencards.description: While Venomous Weapons (Spell) is active, basic attacks apply a stack of Poison that deals 1.2% (Weapon Power) Weapon Damage every 2 seconds for a total of 8 seconds. New stacks reset the duration of the poison.

ravencards.name: venomous contraption
ravencards.description: Venomous Weapons (Spell) apply Deadly Poison to your weapons. Dealing damage with Deadly Poison increases your base critical chance by 0.5%, this effect stacks up to 20 times. Venomous Weapons stacks increased by 6.0.

spells.name: Shadowbind
spells.description: Throws a shadow net that snares the target for 2 seconds. The duration is increased by 0.4 seconds per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: cave spider
ravencards.description: Shadowbind (Spell), in addition to snaring, also silences the target for 1.7 seconds.

ravencards.name: skorn deathblade
ravencards.description: Shadowbound (Spell) targets now take 18.0% more critical damage.

spells.name: Stalk
spells.description: Dashes behind the target, slowing it by 50% for 2 seconds. Stalk (Spell) can be reactivated within 3 seconds to go back to the original cast location. If Stalk (Spell) is not reactivated, reduces its cooldown to 14 seconds.

ravencards.name: forest spider
ravencards.description: Stalk (Spell) applies a 24.0% slow for 6 seconds.

ravencards.name: hookmask knave
ravencards.description: Stalk (Spell) generates 15.0 additional Aether over 5 seconds.

spells.name: Coup de Grace
spells.description: Deals 50.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage to the target, an extra 75.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage, and Coup de Grace cooldown will be reduced by 20 seconds if used within 3 seconds after Stalk (Spell). Increases damage dealt by 40.0% (Weapon Power) per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: vampire vixen
ravencards.description: Increases Coup de Grace (Spell) damage on slowed, snared or stunned creatures by 12.0%.

ravencards.name: elf assassin
ravencards.description: Coup De Grace (Spell) critical chance is 50.0% higher than your current critical chance.

spells.name: Quick Slash
spells.description: Slashes the target, dealing 105.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage. Every third Quick Slash (Spell) has a guaranteed chance to critical hit.

ravencards.name: hoghound raider
ravencards.description: Reduce Quick Slash (Spell) damage by 35.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage. Quick Slash (Spell) reduces the target's (Defense Power) by 4% for 6 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

ravencards.name: brotherhood swordsman
ravencards.description: Quick Slash (Spell) deals 6.0% more damage. If used from behind the target, Quick Slash (Spell) deals 15.0% bonus damage.

spells.name: Shadow Kick
spells.description: Kicks the target, dealing 40.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage and interrupts a target's channeling. If you interrupt a skill, adds a 30% slow to the target's channeling and skill global cooldown for 4 seconds.

ravencards.name: skorn initiate
ravencards.description: Increases your critical chance by 12.0% if you interrupt an ability for 8 seconds.

ravencards.name: rat scavenger
ravencards.description: Shadow Kick (Spell) now slows the target creature by 30.0% for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Sinister Plot
spells.description: Generates 20 Aether per second for 10 seconds.

ravencards.name: skorn acolyte
ravencards.description: Every 25 Aether spent, while Sinister Plot is active increases your critical chance by 3.6% for the duration of Sinister Plot (Spell).

ravencards.name: rat burglar
ravencards.description: If Sinister Plot (Spell) is active, Shadowstrike (Spell) cooldown is reduced by 6.0 seconds.

spells.name: Crippling Dagger
spells.description: Throws a dagger at the target, dealing 75.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage and slowing it by 20% for 8 seconds. While the target is affected by Crippling Dagger (Spell), the skill can be reactivated to dash in front of the target

ravencards.name: brotherhood tracker
ravencards.description: Crippling Dagger (Spell) marks the target. The marked target will receive 12.0% additional damage from your attacks for 6 seconds.

ravencards.name: hookmask killer
ravencards.description: Increases the Aether generated from Crippling Dagger (Spell) by 15.0 but the Aether is generated over 5 seconds.

spells.name: Anti-Healing Venom
spells.description: Deals 50.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage to the target and reduces healing received from skills by 50% for 5 seconds. Increases duration by 2 seconds per 10 Aether consumed. The range of this skill adapts to the weapon you are currently wielding.

ravencards.name: vile wurm
ravencards.description: Now also applies a Venom that deals 7.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage every second for the skill duration.

ravencards.name: bog spider
ravencards.description: Now also applies a Slow Venom, slowing the target by 7.0% for the skill duration.
